messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbr@...>


> This is a new local variable named "word". You want to assign to the
> already-declared field "word".
>
> I do this from time to time.

Yep - I do it from time to time too.

>
> Sometimes you just need another pair of eyes... :)

It's called a sanity check ;-)

Lauren
